full_summary:
### Contract Summary

* **Contract Title (French):** Réparation de revêtement de sol (Flooring Repair)
* **Contract Title (English):** W6895-220086
* **Government Contract ID Number:** WS3647548284-Doc3660100507
* **Contract Status:** Expired
* **Procurement Category:** CNST

### Contract Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services is seeking a standing offer for flooring services to buildings and structures at 4 Wing Cold Lake and Primrose Lake Evaluation Range. The contractor is required to supply all necessary labour, materials, tools, equipment, transportation, and supervision to provide flooring services on an as-and-when-required basis.

### Contract Details

* **Contract Term:** Three (3) years, with an option to extend for an additional one (1) year
* **Contract Start Date:** None
* **Contract End Date:** Februray 13, 2026
* **Bidding Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Bidding Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreement:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** None
* **Regions of Delivery:** Cold Lake, Alberta

### Contract Requirements

* **Services:** Flooring repair services to buildings and structures at 4 Wing Cold Lake and Primrose Lake Evaluation Range
* **Work Schedule:** As-and-when-required basis
* **Contractors:** Two (2) contractors will be selected to provide the required services at a 55%/45% split

### Contract Documents and Information

* **Contact Information:** 
    * **Name:** Colin Simard (SPAC/PSPC)
    * **Email:** [colin.simard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:colin.simard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Contract Notice URL:** [Global Trade and Business Directory](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15090853?extsite=MTUwOTA4NTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Important Notice

**Amended Closing Time:** All bids must be received by 13:00 HNE on February 7, 2023, at the latest. Any bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

I translated the UNSPSC codes and categories in an official translation because they were included in a curly-bracket format in the original file,
